statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.GoodsID , AA.LanguageCode , AA.Option1Type , AA.Option1Name , AA.Option2Type , AA.Option2Name
, CC.Name as LanguageName
FROM dbo.BGGoodsItem AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.ACCode CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.LanguageCode = CC.Code AND CC.ParentCode = 'LanguageCode' WHERE AA.GoodsID = #GoodsID# ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.GoodsID , AA.LanguageCode , AA.Option1Type , AA.Option1Name , AA.Option2Type , AA.Option2Name
FROM dbo.BGGoodsItem AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.BGGoodsItem ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, GoodsID, LanguageCode, Option1Type, Option1Name, Option2Type, Option2Name ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #GoodsID#, #LanguageCode#, #Option1Type#, #Option1Name#, #Option2Type#, #Option2Name# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.BGGoodsItem SET UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName = #UpdateByName#
, GoodsID = #GoodsID# , LanguageCode = #LanguageCode# , Option1Type = #Option1Type# , Option1Name = #Option1Name# , Option2Type = #Option2Type# , Option2Name = #Option2Name# WHERE ID = #ID#
